alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued May 20 at 10:24AM MST until May 20 at 11:15AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A DUST STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM MST FOR CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 1018 AM MST, a dust storm originating from the Red Lake area north of Kingman will continue to restrict visibility over Route 66 between Kingman and Valentine and also I-40 between Kingman and the the Highway 93 intersection. HAZARD...Less than one quarter mile. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This includes Interstate 40 in Arizona between mile markers 64 and 70. Locations impacted include... Valle Vista, Hackberry and Valentine. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
